messages:
Name: Nicolò Zaniolo
Nationality: Italy
Date of Birth: July 2, 1999
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Udinese
Serie A clubs played for: Internazionale, Roma, Atalanta, Fiorentina, Udinese

Nicolò Zaniolo is a midfielder at Udinese who has appeared in the vast majority of the club's Serie A games in 2025/2026, making 12 appearances overall and playing 794 minutes. He has started in 10 of these appearances across their 14 fixtures and been used as a substitute on two occasions.

Zaniolo last appeared in a league game on December 8, playing 90 minutes for Udinese versus Genoa in a 2-1 defeat. The 26-year-old has netted four goals this Serie A campaign, which ranks him joint ninth overall in this category in 2025/2026, while also making him the top league scorer for his side. He has been booked twice.

Zaniolo last scored in the league in the 2-0 win against Parma on November 29, netting in the 11th minute. He opened his account for the campaign against Cremonese on October 20, scoring during a 1-1 draw.
Udinese play host to Napoli on December 14 the next time the side are in Serie A action.
Last season, Zaniolo played 23 Serie A games for Atalanta (14) and Fiorentina (9), scoring two goals and providing two assists.
Zaniolo switched to Udinese on loan in September 2025 from Galatasaray, for whom he has made 14 league appearances in total, scoring five goals and providing one assist.

It was on September 26, 2018 that Zaniolo made his Serie A debut during his spell at Roma, aged 19 years and 86 days, versus Frosinone. He first played in a Serie A game for current outfit Udinese in his team's game versus Pisa on September 14, 2025.

In his Serie A career overall, he has appeared in 129 matches in the competition, with 19 goals scored and eight assists. Zaniolo has also been sent off three times during his Serie A stint, with 38 yellow cards collected overall.
